attributes.action: Teach more about UK and it's History in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In all the lessons i have had not a single one has ever been about major things in Britain. We learn nothing of the Act of Unions, Monarchy, British Empire, how the government of UK works. NONE. 
I propose that we learn more about British History as this would encourage Britishness all over the population

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
